properties.description: This linked service is used for ESG data movement
This notebook is used for delta loading weather data into different tables
This  Event Based trigger will be initiated once the files arrives into ADLS
This trigger will initiate the API
This is a event based which runs once the file arrives in ADLS.
This Dataset is the source file for negative search load.

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Company Name} as string,
		{Report Id} as string,
		Keyword as string,
		{Search Type} as string,
		{API Engine} as string,
		URL as string,
		Article as string,
		Authors as string,
		{Published Date} as string,
		{Modified Date} as string,
		{Title Page} as string,
		{Publication Name} as string,
		Headlines as string,
		URL_Keywords as string,
		Summary as string,
		{Source DomainDescription} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	wildcardPaths:['ESG_Smart_Fetch_Data/esg_websearch_data/*.csv']) ~> source1
source1 derive(CreatedDateTime = currentUTC()) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(input(
		Company_Name as string,
		Report_id as string,
		Keyword as string,
		Search_Type as string,
		API_Engine as string,
		URL as string,
		Article as string,
		Authors as string,
		Published_Date as string,
		Modified_Date as string,
		Title_Page as string,
		Publication_Name as string,
		Headlines as string,
		URL_Keywords as string,
		Summary as string,
		Source_Domain_Description as string,
		CreatedDateTime as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Company_Name = {Company Name},
		Report_id = {Report Id},
		Keyword,
		Search_Type = {Search Type},
		API_Engine = {API Engine},
		URL,
		Article,
		Authors,
		Published_Date = {Published Date},
		Modified_Date = {Modified Date},
		Title_Page = {Title Page},
		Publication_Name = {Publication Name},
		Headlines,
		URL_Keywords,
		Summary,
		Source_Domain_Description = {Source DomainDescription},
		CreatedDateTime
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1

parameters{
	PrimaryKey as string ('Key'),
	Columns as string ('KeywordType,Keywords')
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'Select distinct keywords from TEMP_V_ESG_FINAL_TEST',
	format: 'query') ~> GenericInput
source(output(
		Keyword_id as integer,
		Key as integer,
		Active as integer,
		ActiveStartTime as timestamp,
		ActiveEndTime as timestamp,
		keywords as string,
		KeywordType as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> ExistingDimensionTable
AddHashInput, AddHashExisting exists(AddHashInput@id_hash == AddHashExisting@id_hash
	&& AddHashInput@columns_hash == AddHashExisting@columns_hash,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> NewAndUpdatedRows
GenericInput derive(id_hash = md5(byName($PrimaryKey)),
		columns_hash = md5(byNames(split($Columns,',')))) ~> AddHashInput
FilterForActive derive(id_hash = md5(byNames(split($PrimaryKey,','))),
		columns_hash = md5(byNames(split($Columns,',')))) ~> AddHashExisting
AddHashExisting aggregate(MaxSurrogateKey = max(toInteger(byName('Key')))) ~> GetMaxSurrogateKey
NewAndUpdatedRows keyGenerate(output(Key as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> AddKey
ModifyColumns1, GetMaxSurrogateKey join(Key == MaxSurrogateKey || true(),
	joinType:'cross',
	broadcast: 'right')~> JoinWithMaxSurrogateKey
JoinWithMaxSurrogateKey derive(Key = Key + MaxSurrogateKey,
		Active = 1,
		ActiveStartTime = currentUTC(),
		ActiveEndTime = toTimestamp(toString(null()))) ~> AddDimensionColumns
AddHashExisting, NewAndUpdatedRows exists(AddHashExisting@id_hash == AddHashInput@id_hash,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> FilterForUpdatedValues
FilterForUpdatedValues derive(Active = 0,
		ActiveEndTime = currentUTC()) ~> UpdateObsolete
AddDimensionColumns select(mapColumn(
		each(match(!in(['id_hash','columns_hash','MaxSurrogateKey'],name)))
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DropUnwantedColsInput
MarkAsInsert, DropUnwantedColumns union(byName: true)~> UnionAllData
